enchantment.hex.affection.desc: Prevents the item from reaching durability 0
enchantment.hex.avoiding.desc: Upon falling into the void teleports the item to world spawn
enchantment.hex.cheapskate.desc: Locks the base repair level of an item
enchantment.hex.cultivation.desc: Tills an area around water when right-clicked
enchantment.hex.golden_glint.desc: Tricks Piglins into thinking you are wearing gold armor
enchantment.hex.yang.desc: Repairs the item up to 50% while in light
enchantment.hex.yielding.desc: Increases the amount of crops you can harvest
enchantment.hex.ying.desc: Repairs the item up to 50% while in darkness
